description: Detailed WebExtensions support for Opera.

description: Discussions.

description: Discussions.

description: Map-like promised cache storage with expiration.

name: webext-dynamic-content-scripts
description: Automatically inject your content_scripts on custom domains.

description: TypeScript-ready polyfill to support the standardized promise based API in the browser namespace.

description: Supplies TypeScript types for the browser namespace.

description: Uses redux for managing the state of your WebExtension.

description: Take secure payments in extensions without needing to run a server backend.

description: Upload the extension to the Chrome Web Store via cli (or on Travis, automatically).

description: Command line tool to help build, run, and test WebExtensions.

name: chromepet
description: Get notified when your new version has been published.

description: Download any extension on Chrome Web Store to see how they do it.

name: chrome-store-api
description: Chrome Web Store API wrapper.

name: Chrome extension source viewer
description: WebExtension to view source code of extensions directly on the store.

name: @wext/shipit
description: Tool to automatically publish to Chrome Web Store, Mozilla Addons and Opera Addons.

name: wext-manifest-loader
description: Webpack loader that lets you specify manifest.json properties to appear only in specific browsers.

name: webextension-manifest-loader
description: Webpack loader that loads browser tailored manifest.json. It also imports all importable properties, allowing you to have 'manifest.json' as your only webpack entry point.

name: webpack-extension-reloader
description: A Webpack plugin to automatically reload browser extensions during development.

name: webpack-target-webextension
description: Adds code-splitting support to WebExtensions build with Webpack

name: sinon-chrome
description: Mocks the Chrome Extensions API for testing.

name: addons-validator
description: Validate an extension against Mozilla's guidelines.

name: webextensions-jsdom
description: Load popup, sidebar and background with JSDOM based on the manifest.json.

name: webextensions-api-fake
description: In-memory WebExtensions API Fake Implementation (includes TypeScript types).

name: webextensions-api-mock
description: WebExtensions API as sinon stubs (includes TypeScript types).

name: webextensions-schema
description: Programmatically consume the WebExtensions Schema JSON files.

name: browser-extension-template
description: Barebones boilerplate with webpack, options handler and auto-publishing.

name: create-webextension
description: Yarn WebExtension generator.

name: extensionizr.com
description: Web UI that helps you create an initial configuration and files.

name: generator-web-extension
description: WebExtension generator that creates everything you need to get started with cross-browser web-extension development.

name: vue-web-extension
description: A Vue CLI 3+ preset for quickly starting a web extension with Vue, Babel, ESLint and more!

name: mdn/webextension-examples
description: Various example extensions curated for the MDN documentation.
